## Overview

This was built as part of a deliverable for the course Developing Data Products as part of the Coursera Data Science Specialization.

The app developed for the first part of the assignment demo is avalilable at: https://singsanj.shinyapps.io/testapp/

## Web Application functionality

The website uses US census data from the year 2010, You can download it [here](https://shiny.rstudio.com/tutorial/lesson5/census-app/data/counties.rds).
